column1: Accordingly,  the withdrawal of the appeal is allowed and the appeal is
dismissed.  Court  orders  the  Prison  Authorities  to  implement  the  sentence
from  the  date  of conviction  namely  14.09.2015.
remain as it is.  Registrar is hereby directed to return the case record to the
Registrar of the High Court of Batticaloa.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL.

column1: s.  DEVIKA DE L.  TENNEKOON, J.
